abstract: Silver Spring Networks, a high-profile, smart-grid start-up, has tapped bankers to manage an initial public offering expected for the middle of 2010, Dow Jones’s Clean Technology Insight reported, citing a person familiar with the situation.
snippet: Silver Spring Networks, a high-profile, smart-grid start-up, has tapped bankers to manage an initial public offering expected for the middle of 2010, Dow Jones’s Clean Technology Insight reported, citing a person familiar with the situation.
lead_paragraph: Silver Spring Networks, a high-profile smart grid start-up, has tapped bankers to manage an initial public offering expected to launch in the middle of 2010, Dow Jones‘s Clean Technology Insight reported, citing a person familiar with the situation.

headline.main: Silver Spring Said to Pick Banks for I.P.O.

abstract: A burst of enthusiasm was not enough to propel the Dow Jones industrial average above its Dec. 31 close.
snippet: A burst of enthusiasm was not enough to propel the Dow Jones industrial average above its Dec. 31 close.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street reached a milestone on Monday that had eluded it for some time: two major stock indexes crossed into positive territory for the year.

headline.main: Nasdaq and S.&P. Positive for the Year
headline.print_headline: Nasdaq and S.&P. Positive For the Day and the Year
